thread.title: San Antonio Police Respond To Shooting At Mall - CBS Local
thread.title_full: San Antonio Police Respond To Shooting At Mall - CBS Local

title: San Antonio Police Respond To Shooting At Mall - CBS Local
text:
San Antonio Police Respond To Shooting At Mall January 22, 2017 6:22 PM Filed Under: Rolling Oaks Mall Developing-Story 2016 
SAN ANTONIO (AP) â€” Police in San Antonio say they have responded to a shooting at a large shopping mall. 
Romana Lopez, a spokeswoman for San Antonio police, confirmed that police on Sunday were at Rolling Oaks Mall. 
Lopez did not immediately provide any other details about the shooting. 
Video from local television stations showed police cars and at least two ambulances at the mall.
